name: Beyond Isolation
description:
This game is about the feeling of isolation and connection in a virus situation and beyond.

Music: The Face of Our New Hope by Ludwig Forssell

(Try a different web browser if there's no sound)

Move:  W A S D / Arrow keys

Rules:

  • The virus in this game behave the same as covid- 19.
  • Red color means  syptom showed.
  • Contacting with infected human will infect you, even if their symptom are not shown.
  • If you don't contact other human your social life will decrease, which will slow you down and eventually causes death.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/SebastianLuvLee
